text: John E. Sununu (born September 10, 1964) is a former United States Senator from New Hampshire and a member of the Republican Party. He was in the United States House of Representatives from 1997 to 2003. Sununu served in the United States Senate from January 3, 2003, to January 3, 2009. Sununu was born on September 10, 1964 in Boston, Massachusetts to former Governor of New Hampshire John H. Sununu. He studied at Massachusetts Institute of Technology and at Harvard Business School. He is married to Kitty Sununu. They have three children. His brother, Chris Sununu is the Governor-elect of New Hampshire. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Engineers from Massachusetts Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni Category:Politicians from Boston Category:United States representatives from New Hampshire Category:United States senators from New Hampshire Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John E. Sununu
